room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
room_description:
Q Quarantine and Sanitarium opened its doors in 1890. By 1940, the staff there had treated thousands of patients. In the mid-century, it was discovered that many of the patients were getting worse instead of getting better, and some had disappeared altogether.
In the 1960s, an investigation revealed that the doctors had been performing dangerous and unethical experiments on the patients, and the asylum was shut down.  We are pleased to announce that the horrors of the past are behind us, and the facility is reopening its doors under new management. We welcome anyone to visit who is in need ofâ€¦ treatment.
